courtlistener.description: CourtListener MCP Server — Free Law Project. Search millions of federal and state court opinions, PACER dockets, oral arguments, and judicial data across 3,352+ U.S. jurisdictions. Includes citation lookup and verification API. Requires COURTLISTENER_API_TOKEN env var (free at courtlistener.com/sign-in/).
courtlistener.notes: Install via: git clone https://github.com/Travis-Prall/court-listener-mcp && cd CourtListener && uv sync && uv run start

google-scholar-legal.description: Google Scholar MCP Server — Search legal opinions, case law, and law review articles via Google Scholar's Case Law database. Free, no API key required.
google-scholar-legal.notes: Install via: git clone https://github.com/yourusername/google-scholar-mcp && pip install -r requirements.txt

web-search.description: Claude's built-in web search — Used for real-time lookups on Cornell LII, Justia, California Legislature, Idaho Legislature, eCFR, and other free legal databases.

google-drive.description: Google Drive connector — Search and retrieve legal documents, contracts, research notes, and reference materials stored in your Drive.

filesystem.description: Local filesystem access — Read/write legal documents, research files, and case briefs in your designated legal workspace folder.
